metadata.title: CVE-2023-38000 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Auth. Stored (contributor+) Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability inWordPress core 6.3 through 6.3.1, from 6.2 through 6.2.2, from 6.1 through6.1.3, from 6.0 through 6.0.5, from 5.9 through 5.9.7 and Gutenberg plugin<= 16.8.0 versions.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
